p: In another QSAR study undertaken by Kumbhare et al., a novel class of isoxazoles and triazoles linked 2-phenyl benzothiazoles were synthesized and tested against three cancer cell lines for their anticancer activity. As a result of this study, the introduction of fluorine, in the form of (â€“CF 3) group, enhanced the benzothiazole derivative 16 cytotoxicity against Colo-205 and A549 cells by causing an increase in the active caspase-3 and PARP and degradation of procaspase-8 and 9 proteins [ 132].
